duties_responsibilities.duty: Strong understanding of Balance Sheet, P&L & Cashflow models.
Assist with month-end close process by preparing journal entries and account reconciliations.
Ensure data integrity of financial statement information.
Perform audit of operation activities by reviewing financial data.
Work with internal business leaders to ensure divisional reporting coordination.
Provide ad-hoc analysis from different leaders within the business.
Assist with forecasting and modeling for budgets.
Assess and interpret data and subsequently coordinate the design and implementation of reports, dashboards and BI related tools.
Calculate monthly incentives for sales teams.
Ability to work independently with cross-functional departments to obtain an understanding of key metrics that impact the business.
Develop financial reporting appropriate to analyze trends, margins, and opportunities.
Assist with tools to review all aspects of the business.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance (Master's preferred)
